document.full_text: kyle rudolph reminds me of jason witten because he's a big, physical player who imposes his will as a blocker and ball carrier, but he's also savvy and nimble as a receiver and route runner.
document.title: n.f.l. draft: kyle rudolph, second-ranked tight end
lines_and_colors: kyle rudolph reminds me of jason witten because he's a big, physical player who imposes his will as a blocker and ball carrier, but he's also savvy and nimble as a receiver and route runner.
